users.name: John George
users.title: Bootstrap & CSS Developer
users.bio: Ray Villalobos is a full-time author and teacher at lynda.com. He is author of the book, Exploring Multimedia for Designers. He has more than 20 years experience in developing and programming multimedia projects. Previously at Entravision Communications, he designed and developed a network of radio station and TV web sites. As a senior producer for Tribune Interactive, he was responsible for designing orlandosentinel.com and for creating immersive multimedia projects and Flash games for the site.
users.description: As responsive design continues to take over the web, front-end developers and designers have turned to preprocessors and layout systems that simplify their workflow.

users.name: Ray Williams
users.title: Python Developer
users.description: Python is a dynamically typed programming language designed by Guido Van Rossum. Much like the programming language Ruby, Python was designed to be easily read by programmers.

users.name: July George
users.title: Homebrew Developer
users.description: Homebrew is a package manager for Apple's macOS operating system.
